divs: Sighting DetailsWe live in a 3 story house the front is glass all the way up 3 floors. I can see the stars every night as I am in bed. This nite I lay watching TV I saw a bright light hovering over the tree line , I noticed it and thought wow that star is bright. Then I thought it couldnt be a star its too low and if it were a plane it would crash in a min. As I watched TV I kept glancing at it every little bit. I saw it get real bright then dim. It was there more than 30 min. Then it started moving around so I had to keep looking through the trees to find it. Then it just moved off. About a day or 2 later as I was in bed watching TV a bright flash of light appeared in the glass it caught my attention as I looked I caught it moving to the left out of my sight. I thought I just saw a ghost a orb.I thought it was inside the window. It startled me and I kept my eyes fixed on the glass , then it came back across to the right I got a good look this time and saw it was on the outside of the glass.It was bright white and transparent almost. About twice or 3 times the size of a basketball. When I realized it was like dancing in the window and I really was seeing it. I threw back the covers and jumped up in the bed, it was only 15 feet at most from me. When I stood up in bed it was like it saw me too and just vanished. I would like to know what this was and if it has been seen before in this area.
